system.description: The character can override the programming of simple machine creatures through direct interface.
system.benefit: As a Half Action, Character can try to command any creature with the Machine Trait and an Intelligence 20 or less, making an Opposed Tech-Use vs Willpower Test. If successful the target creature follows the Character's commands for the following round. The Character can maintain control by spending a Half Action each round, and making another Opposed Test every four rounds to maintain the link. Commands given must be simple and achievable within a single round, such as Flee, Fall, Attack nearby target.

rollConfig.description: Opposed Tech-Use vs Willpower to command machine creatures

specialAbilities.name: Machine Override
specialAbilities.description: As a Half Action, make an Opposed Tech-Use vs Willpower test to command simple machine creatures (Machine trait, Int 20 or less) for one round. Maintain with Half Actions each round, testing every four rounds.
